seo.title: Translation of your video from Javanese into English in the Vidby service
seo.description: Online dubbing from Javanese into English and from English into Javanese for your video in the Vidby service using our modern and high quality algorithms.

content:
Video Translation and Dub from Javanese to English

The language barrier is a considerable problem for the sector of the video translation services, especially if it is all about the translation from Javanese to English.

In this article, we will touch on the online video translator VidBy, which offers its professional and proven-by-the-time services to dub and translate Javanese video to English and vice versa. Moreover, you will see what this innovative service can provide you with and the benefits you can take. But firstly, it is worth getting to know this language pair better.

The popularity and complexities of the language pair (Javanese-English)

Talking about this language pair, you probably know a lot about English. And it is not surprising because this language is the king of languages and is spoken by over 1.6 billion people globally. Due to its widespread popularity and usage, there are 160 dialects of the language, which are a real pain for translators and people who deal with this sphere.

The second language of this pair is Javanese. It is an official language for the people living in Indonesia, particularly on the island of Java (from here, the name of the language). According to the statistics, the number of native speakers consists of 92 million people. One of the most challenging complexities of the language is that it features three levels, which are used for different purposes (one level to communicate with older people, another level for communication with people you respect, and the last one - the communication with your friends).

For the video translation service VidBy is not that difficult to distinguish all these levels and make a video translate Javanese to English in the most understandable way.

The algorithm of work: How to translate a video from Javanese to English at VidBy?

The video translation service VidBy takes advantage of available advanced technologies, which are essentially based on artificial intelligence. Thanks to these technologies, all the process of dubbing and translating from Javanese to English and in the opposite direction is wholly automatized. However, you need to do a few things to get the result required.

Initially, uploading a video you want to translate from one language to another is essential. You can also link directly to the video and click on the Start button. After that, you will be asked to clarify the order’s details. And finally, you need to download the translated and dubbed video on your device.

So, you see that the working algorithm is not complicated, and what is more important, you do not have to do almost anything to get a translated video from Javanese to English.

Additional services to improve translation from Javanese to English

To provide customers with astonishing results, the Javanese to English translation video service VidBy has developed a few exciting and, at the same time, valuable features that are designed to improve the quality of any translation. Let us consider them in more detail.

A multitude of emotions

One of the essential things that every translated video should have is the presence of emotions. Therefore, while using the service VidBy, you can count on six emotions that can be assigned to different people’s voices. The initial pool of the emotions is not that huge and includes:

  • Anger;
  • Disgust;
  • Joy;
  • Surprise;
  • Fear;
  • Sadness.

This starter pack is just the beginning and the ground for something bigger. But for this stage of development, it should be enough.

Speech synthesizer

A speech synthesizer is the second valuable development that helps translated videos have a natural and realistic sound. This innovative tool allows you to generate different voices for different people. For instance, you can easily give a child a child’s voice.

What are the benefits of working with VidBy?

In addition to these innovative tools, the video translation service VidBy provides its customers with several benefits. And with the help of these benefits, it is getting easier to have an honestly positive experience with VidBy.

Quick translation result

For most businesses, universities, governmental bodies, and other institutions, the exceptional speed of the delivery of the translation from Javanese to English or in the opposite direction is one of the critical points. Knowing this, VidBy and its innovative advanced technology with additional supportive tools can translate video Javanese to English 1,000 times faster compared to other video translation services with the traditional approach on the board. To calculate the estimated time for yourself, you need to double the time of the total length of the original video.

Guaranteed quality of translation

Knowing that the Javanese to English translation video service VidBy guarantees an exceptional delivery time of any video translation, you may have doubts about the quality of the video translation there. But, you do not need to worry about this issue because the quality of the translation is fantastic. On the official website, you can watch the translated videos from Javanese to English and vice versa and decide on your own.

Low cost

While many traditional video translation services rely mostly on real people, their services cost a lot of money (one translation can cost you hundreds or even thousands of dollars). And it is not that good to spend a lot of money, especially if there is an option to cut off the expenses and save the money. It is possible at VidBy since all the translations are done by one software.

Different subscriptions

To give an option to save even more money, you can purchase one out of three subscriptions that are specifically and thoughtfully designed for different purposes. Among them are:

  • Basis;
  • Extended;
  • Professional.

All subscriptions have unique advantages over each other, and some offer unique perks.

Editing of transcripts

All members of the Professional subscription can guaranteed count on the opportunity to edit transcripts. This opportunity helps to increase the accuracy rate of the translated videos from Javanese to English and in the opposite direction.

How to get a translated video from Javanese to English?

And the last moment remains the answer to the question - how to translate video Javanese to English and get a translated video?

The video translation service offers an innovative solution to translate videos of different lengths within the frame of this language pair with ease. The video translation process is completely automatized. However, you still need to do a few elementary things to make the video translate Javanese to English process done correctly.

First and foremost, the video translation service should know what exactly to translate and dub. That is why it is required to have a video. This step can be done in two ways. The first one - upload the video file from your device. And another one - put a link into a particular line (it is the fastest way).

When you have done this easy step, the level of complexity goes up - you will be asked to specify the details of the order. It means that you need to provide VidBy with specific information, like the video’s original language, the language you wish to translate it, etc.

And the last thing is to download the translated video on your device after the AI-based software has finished the process.

Conclusion

VidBy is an innovative solution that allows its customers to translate Javanese video to English and in the opposite direction without any complexities, for a reasonable price, and in the fastest way.

FAQ

  1. How long does it take to translate a video from Javanese to English at VidBy?

It is a well-known fact that video translation services, which use the traditional way of dubbing and translating from Javanese to English, need days, weeks, or even months to complete this task. And here is the question: how much time does the video translation service VidBy need to do the same job? To answer this question, you need to understand the simple math - take the total length of the original video and multiply it by two. That is the answer.

  1. What is the quality of the video translation from Javanese to English at VidBy?

The software performs all video translation processes based on artificial intelligence and other products (the speech synthesizer and the implementation of emotions). Knowing this innovative complex, it is getting more evident that the quality of the translated videos from Javanese to English and vice versa is on the highest level.

  1. How accurate is the video translation from Javanese to English at VidBy?

The accuracy level of any video translation from Javanese to English is equal to 99%. It is not a perfect score, but there is still an option of editing transcripts (for the members of the Professional subscription only) to increase this number to 100%.

  1. How can I translate a video from Javanese to English?

There are plenty of ways how you can dub and translate a video from Javanese to English and vice versa. However, if you are looking for a fast and great result, it is worth considering the option of the video translation service VidBy. The service offers a wholly automatized process, and the only things you need to do are: upload a video, which must be translated, specify the details of the order, and download the video. That is all.
